Name: yellow nail syndrome
Definition: A syndrome that is characterized by an accumulation of protein-rich fluid (lymph) in the soft layers of tissue under the skin resulting in pleural effusions

Name: nonsyndromic congenital nail disorder 1
Definition: A serine deficiency that is characterized by multiple fatal malformations including ichthyosis

Name: paronychia
Definition: A nail disease characterized by often-tender bacterial or fungal hand infection or foot infection due to either bacteria or fungus (Candida albicans) where the nail and skin meet at the side or the base of a finger or toe nail. The infection can start suddenly (acute paronychia) or gradually (chronic paronychia). Puss is usually present

Name: candidal paronychia
Definition: A candidiasis that results_in fungal infection of the outer-most layer located_in nail

Name: chronic mucocutaneous candidiasis
Definition: A candidiasis that refers to a heterogeneous group of disorders characterized by recurrent or persistent superficial fungal infections located_in skin
